Sentencas: Thin films of BaCe(0.8)Gd(0.2)O(3) were prepared by solid state reaction of two screen-printed layers over porous substrates.
Titulo: Preparation of proton conducting BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 thin films

Sentencas: The first layer consists of the oxygen ion conductor Ce(0.8)Gd(0.2)O(2) with a fluorite structure, whereas the top layer consists of BaCO(3).
Titulo: Preparation of proton conducting BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 thin films

Sentencas: After decomposition of the carbonate, BaO reacts with Ce(0.8)Gd(0.2)O(2) forming the perovskite oxide BaCe(0.8)Gd(0.2)O(3-delta) with protonic conductivity.
Titulo: Preparation of proton conducting BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 thin films

Sentencas: The in-situ reaction and densification on the porous substrates results in gastight thin layers of 10 to 50 pm and allows overcoming the problems due to the poor sinterability of the proton conductor.
Titulo: Preparation of proton conducting BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 thin films

Sentencas: Two different porous substrates prepared by warm-pressing were studied as membrane supports, i.e., (i) porous composite NiO-Zr(0.85)Y(0.15)O(2), commonly employed as solid oxide fuel cell anode and (ii) porous Ce(0.8)Gd(0.2)O(2) oxide.
Titulo: Preparation of proton conducting BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 thin films

Sentencas: The structural properties of the layer, compositional gradients and occurring phases are described, as well as water uptake, gastightness (He leaking rate) and emf measurement.
Titulo: Preparation of proton conducting BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 thin films

Sentencas: Protonic conducting membranes are particularly suited not only for hydrogen separation combined with reforming and water-gas-shift converters but also as a protonic fuel cell electrolyte.
Titulo: Preparation of proton conducting BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 thin films
Preparation of proton conducting BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 thin films
Preparation of proton conducting BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 thin films
